/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling construction site in the heart of Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering cranes and buildings that dominate the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the industrial landscape below. A large billboard adorns the side of a building, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The image is taken from a street-level perspective, immersing the viewer directly into the scene.
